body.name: CPOTAM Handheld Game Console, Portable Retro Game Console with 500 Classical FC Games,3.0-Inches Display,Built-in 1020mAh Rechargeable Battery Support for Connecting TV and Two Players(Blue)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 13 hrs 47 mins
features: 🎮【Classic and Portable Design】Small and lite style body design, ultra-compact size, equipped with an optimized system with higher stability,can provide an excellent gaming experience.With 3.0-inch display, you can see more details and beautiful scenes in the game. it is very convenient whether you carry it with you during business trips,travel or camping. Recall the dream of the games anytime,anywhere.

🎮【500 Super Classic Games】The retro handheld portable game console contains 500 popular games,covering puzzle,adventure, shooting,racing,fighting and other game types.It can be played endlessly without any additional cost.
🎮【Built-in 1020 mAh Rechargeable battery】Replaceable upgraded 1020 mAh li-po battery,it can play for up 5-6 hours on a single charge,let you play time anytime,anywhere,and defeat more game bosses.

🎮【Support for Two Players and Connecting TV】With an extra handle, you can connect to the little handheld game console for two-player games. With the 3-inch LCD screen, you can be connected to the TV via the AV output, so you can easily enjoy lively and exciting video games on the TV's big screen.

🎮【Perfect Gifts for Children/Adults】The game console not only brings fun and joyful game time, but also brings us some childhood memories, exercises coordination skills for children, and releases stress for adults.This is the perfect gift for Birthday and Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So easy to use
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This little gaming system is perfect for my 5 and 7 year old! We love that it is chargeable and we aren’t constantly changing batteries. We love that it is easy to scroll through and pick a game. We love that the sound can be completely turned off.. lot of fun old school games available. This has been a great gift for my boys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Do not purchase
reviews.reviewText: This item was poorly and cheaply made. As soon as it was unboxed, the battery cover fell out and refused to stay in place. The plastic clip was thin and wouldn't hold the cover in place. This was purchased as a gift, but it was so bad it went in the trash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars a fun one time thing
reviews.reviewText: A very fun video game console. Not great quality. If you drop it, it will break immediately. it is great for travel.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Has so many fun games
reviews.reviewText: I love this it is so fun for my kid and I love watching him have a good time

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap NES on chip portable with easy to find replacement batteries
reviews.reviewText: Unit is ok. D-pad and buttons feel mostly responsive but very mushy and not clicky at all. Comes preinstalled with a Nintendo System on a chip and several ROM's. Most of the games seem to work and the screen is acceptable but has a fair amount of light bleed. Even at this price, would have expected a bezel with a pad to help with this. . Unit is cheap and feels the same. The Nokia type rechargeable battery it runs on is very easy to find if you need a spare or replacement. The menu music is super annoying, however you don't buy a cheap portable China 8 bit nintendo emulator for menu music. If you want an inexpensive, ok distraction this would do the trick. Kids would likely love it. As a bonus, unit comes with a headphone jack so silent play would be an option for those long trips.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Easily scratch able screen
reviews.reviewText: Came with a scratch. Thought it was a smear. Screen scratches easily. Even if you try to wipe a smear off, scratches. DON’T use a cloth that’s used for eyeglasses to wipe this screen, will scratch. Will exchange it out.
